venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our February BizSpark Meetup will be held on Tuesday, February 9th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. The security officer will direct attendees to the correct floor. There is also parking available at a cheap evening rate in the building. Parking is also free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM.

At 6:30 PM Ben Grossman will present Social Media Marketing Strategies for Startups. Ben is one of the premier digital marketing strategists in in the Boston area. Check out his site at (http://ben-grossman.c...)

At 7:30 PM Kabir Hemrajani will pitch RiotVine "pokin' holes" style to Chris Hurley of Revolutionary Angels and some other Angels / VCs to be announced. RiotVine is a fellow BizSpark startup and is one of the hottest startups in the Boston area right now. You may have seen him pitch to Venrock's David Beisel on DartBoston a few months back.

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any startup-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests.
item.name: Social Media Marketing for Startups | RiotVine Pitch by Kabir Hemrajani to VCs
